org.gradoop.temporal.model.api.functions

Interface TemporalAggregateFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AggregateFunction, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTimeAggregateFunction, AverageDuration, AverageEdgeDuration, AverageVertexDuration, MaxDuration, MaxEdgeDuration, MaxEdgeTime, MaxTime, MaxVertexDuration, MaxVertexTime, MinDuration, MinEdgeDuration, MinEdgeTime, MinTime, MinVertexDuration, MinVertexTime

    public interface TemporalAggregateFunction
extends AggregateFunction
    An aggregate function used by the Aggregation operator that handles TemporalElements separately.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default PropertyValue getIncrement(Element element)
      Get the increment to be added to the aggregate from an element.
      PropertyValue getIncrement(TemporalElement element)
      Get the increment of a temporal element to be added to the aggregate value.
      default PropertyValue getNonTemporalIncrement(Element element)
      Get the default value used for non-temporal elements or throw an exception.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.flink.model.api.functions.AggregateFunction

        aggregate, applyResult, getAggregatePropertyKey, isEdgeAggregation, isVertexAggregation, postAggregate

    • Method Detail

      • getIncrement

        default PropertyValue getIncrement(Element element)
        Get the increment to be added to the aggregate from an element. The default implementation of this method will check if the element is a temporal element, in that case the increment will be determined by getIncrement(TemporalElement). Otherwise the value of getNonTemporalIncrement(Element) will be used.
        Note: Implementations of the TemporalAggregateFunction interface should implement getIncrement(TemporalElement) (and optionally getNonTemporalIncrement(Element)) instead of this method.
        Specified by:
        getIncrement in interface AggregateFunction
        Parameters:
        element - element used to get the increment
        Returns:
        The increment, possibly null.
        See Also:
        method to be implemented instead of this method.

      • getNonTemporalIncrement

        default PropertyValue getNonTemporalIncrement(Element element)
        Get the default value used for non-temporal elements or throw an exception. By default, an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        element - The non-temporal element.
        Returns:
        The default aggregate value.

      • getIncrement

        PropertyValue getIncrement(TemporalElement element)
        Get the increment of a temporal element to be added to the aggregate value.
        Parameters:
        element - The temporal element.
        Returns:
        The increment, possibly null.
        See Also:
        about this method.
